education.area: Control of Robotic and Autonomus Systems (ME)

research.name: Soft Matter Engineering Laboratory, UM
research.summary: Designed and built a customizable 3D printer for soft material.
highlights: 3-axis gantry positioning with 10 μ m resolution
Control software development for lab use: G-Code reading algorithm, syncing control module for pneumatic extruter and motion system, Finite-state machine-based Windows UI software

research.name: Smart and Micro/Nano Systems Laboratory, UM
research.position: Libot: Autonomous Mobile Manipulation Robot for Libraries
research.summary: Libot is a mobile robot designed to automate tasks in libraries
highlights: Achieved deep learning based object detection and Grasp Pose Detection for pick-and-place
Implemented p2p navigation leveraging the ROS navigation stack with hector-mapping SLAM algorithm

professional.name: Mechanical Systems Control Lab, UC Berkeley
highlights: Designing and iterating on a flexible Degrees of Freedom (DoF) robot prototype using SolidWorks
Developed URDF models from CAD designs for software simulation in Timor/Gazebo to optimize design iterations and predict performance
Fabricating prototypes using 3D printing, validating concepts of flexible DoF by modularized design

professional.name: SUIRUI Technology Group Co., Ltd (SUIRUI.AI Industrial Robot Beijing)
highlights: SolidWorks based Finite Element Analysis on both stress load deformation and thermal dissipation rate of motor shield for explosion-proof inspection robots, providing result to structural designers

Designed track installation floor plan using AutoCAD and connection methods for rail inspection robots onsite project. Performed dynamic stress analysis to validate the material selection and track installation plan

professional.name: Centre for Artificial Intelligence and Robotics (CAIR), Macao
highlights: Led Procurement and Vendor Management: Successfully led the procurement of a 3-axis gantry positioning system, ensuring it was within budget. Sourced suppliers, communicated technical specifications for a customized design, and secured competitive quotations from three vendors

Mechatronic System Integration: Established precise control over positioning system powered by ABB servos using a PWM control unit. Integrated the connection between the positioning system and a pneumatic extrusion outlet

Software Development and System Control: Developed a desktop application for unified control of both positioning and pneumatic systems. The program reads G-Code and enables customized 3D printing operations

volunteer.summary: Provided individual pastoral care to residents, prioritizing their well-being and proactively identifying potential challenges while maintaining the utmost confidentiality

highlights: Jointly organized an online seminar: Introduction to Monochrome
Edited photo album Reunion vs Separation as deputy editor
Located funding from University of Macau Development Foundation

awards.summary: FST Final Year Project Dean's Honors List, Click to see my FYProject: Development and Testing of a Moblie Manipulation Robot

awards.summary: Awarded for demonstrating outstanding service and leadership

publications.name: Zur Elektrody/namik bewegter Körper
publications.summary: It concerned an interpretation of the Michelson–Morley experiment and the properties of light and time. Special relativity incorporates the principle that the speed of light is the same for all inertial observers regardless of the state of motion of the source.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
